attributes.action: Ask credit agencies not to register missed/late payments during Covid19 outbreak
attributes.additional_details: Many people will be suffering financially at this time and this will no doubt lead to an increase in missed and late payments. This has a massive impact on people's future borrowing capability for the next 6 years, in some cases preventing standard borrowing and pushing people down adverse credit routes which increases the cost to them. In other cases actually meaning that it can be impossible to borrow any funds for 6 years.
attributes.background: Apply pressure on all credit reference agencies that they do not register any negative transactions on people's accounts during this coronavirus pandemic.
